channel.title: Mark Bittman on Brayden's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Mark Bittman on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: Skillet Spanakopita
item.description: Taken from How to Cook Everything Fast, page 468-469 Ingredients 10 to 12 sheets of phyllo dough 3 tablespoons olive oil 4 scallions two 10-ounce bags of spinach salt and pepper 2 eggs 6 ounces feta cheese (1 1/2 cups crumbled) 1 teaspoon dried dill 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg 4 tablespoons butter Directions Remove phyllo from freezer. Heat oven to 350 degrees. Put olive oil in a medium ovenproof skillet over low heat.
